verses.text: And these \add are the countries\add* which the children of Israel inherited in the land of Canaan, which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel distributed for inheritance to them.
By lot \add was\add* their inheritance, as the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses, for the nine tribes, and \add for\add* the half-tribe.
For Moses had given the inheritance of two tribes and a half-tribe on the other side of Jordan: but to the Levites he gave no inheritance among them.

For the children of Joseph were two tribes, Manasseh and Ephraim: therefore they gave no part to the Levites in the land, save cities to dwell \add in\add* , with their suburbs for their cattle, and for their substance.
As the LORD commanded Moses, so the children of Israel did, and they divided the land.

Then the children of Judah came to Joshua in Gilgal: and Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite said to him, Thou knowest the thing that the LORD said to Moses the man of God concerning me and thee in Kadesh-barnea.
Forty years old \add was\add* I when Moses the servant of the LORD sent me from Kadesh-barnea to explore the land; and I brought him word again as it \add was\add* in my heart.
Nevertheless, my brethren that went up with me made the heart of the people melt: but I wholly followed the LORD my God.
And Moses swore on that day, saying, Surely the land on which thy feet have trodden shall be thy inheritance, and thy children's for ever; because thou hast wholly followed the LORD my God.

And now, behold, the LORD hath kept me alive, as he said, these forty and five years, even since the LORD spoke this word to Moses, while \add the children of\add* Israel wandered in the wilderness: and now, lo, I \add am\add* this day eighty five years old.

As yet I \add am as\add* strong this day, as \add I was\add* in the day that Moses sent me: as my strength \add was\add* then, even so \add is\add* my strength now, for war, both to go out, and to come in.

Now therefore give me this mountain, of which the LORD spoke in that day; for thou heardest in that day how the Anakims \add were\add* there, and \add that\add* the cities \add were\add* great \add and\add* fortified: if the LORD \add will be\add* with me, then I shall be able to drive them out, as the LORD said.
And Joshua blessed him, and gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh Hebron for an inheritance.
Hebron therefore became the inheritance of Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite to this day; because that he wholly followed the LORD God of Israel.
And the name of Hebron before \add was\add* Kirjath-arba; \add which Arba was\add* a great man among the Anakims. And the land had rest from war.
